short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See what's next on your Codesmith schedule!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Would you like to know what you're supposed to be doing right now at the click of a button?

Well, CodeCal is the extension for you!
Code has your schedule and will dynamically change to today's date while highlighting the current event you should be doing.

Download CodeCal now to have a better life experience!
